name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with over 13 years of experience specializing in full stack development. Proficient in **.NET**, **C#**, **ASP.NET**, and **.NET Core**, complemented by strong skills in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **React.JS**. Demonstrated expertise in building responsive user interfaces and backend services, utilizing **AJAX**, **CSS**, and various database technologies including **RDBMS** (SqlServer, Oracle, PostgreSQL) and **Non-RDBMS** (MongoDB).
Adept in creating robust API architectures with **REST** and **GraphQL**, and experienced in implementing microservices and containerization using **Docker** and **OpenShift**. Skilled in cloud services, particularly deploying secure applications on **AWS**, utilizing **AWS Secrets Manager**, and managing secrets in **Azure Keyvault** and **Hashicorp Vault**.
Familiar with CI/CD practices using **Azure DevOps** and capable of maintaining monitoring solutions with **Dynatrace**. Known for a team-oriented, user-focused approach to software development and solutions, consistently demonstrating a can-do attitude.
